text: aihikajivitattil avar celavalikkunnatinre ‎upama keatuntanuppulla oru sitakkarrinretan. at ‎svantatteat atikramam kanicca oru ‎janavibhagattinre krsiyitatte badhiccu. ‎annaneyat a krsiye nissesam nasippiccu. ‎allahu avareat dreahameannum ceytittilla. avar ‎tannalettanne dreahikkukayayirunnu. ‎
